problem_text_cn: 如图,⊙O中弦AB经过圆心O,点C是圆上一点,∠BAC=52°,则∠ABC的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the chord AB in ⊙O passes through the center O, point C is a point on the circle, ∠BAC = N_0, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵⊙O中弦AB经过圆心O,即AB是直径,∴∠C=90°,∴∠ABC=90°-∠BAC=90°-52°=38°．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了圆周角定理,直径所对的圆周角是直角,正确理解定理是关键．
